segments.text: Yeah , I've been working out a lot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long have you been lifting weights ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For a year and a half .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . Last time I saw you , it was like 2 years ago .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How often do you go to the gym ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I usually go every other day for about 3 hours .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , I used to work out for an hour a day 4 times a week , and I saw no results . This is what you have to do to get noticeable results .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't think I have the discipline for that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just think of it as a hobby . Then it's actually fun .
segments.speaker: S2
